DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect control adverse environment ( CAE ) Mean Break-Up Area subject diagnose Dry Eye Syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Controlled Adverse Environment ( CAE ) Tear Film Stability
DOC.detailed_description: Single-Center , Pilot , control adverse environment ( CAE ) Study . This single-center , one visit , pilot , CAE study . Dry Eye Subjects ( N=30 ) qualify undergo tear film video recording , fluorescein staining , break time CAE exposure CAE exposure . All subject undergo baseline dry eye assessment include fluorescein staining , breakup time , conjunctival redness tear film video record . Subjects qualify undergo CAE exposure 90 minute . At end CAE exposure subject undergo dry eye assessment .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age & either sex , race Willing able follow instruction Positive history dry eye disease Use desire use drop dry eye within past 6 month Have plan surgery trial period Female currently pregnant , plan pregnancy lactate Use disallow medication Have ocular infection , ocular condition could affect study parameter Have use investigational drug device within 30 day start study Female currently pregnant , plan pregnancy lactate
